H0.text: A test tube is the best tool for a student to use when measuring a precise amount of liquid.

H1.text: A meter stick is the best tool for a student who needs to measure out a precise amount of liquid.

H2.text: Balance scale is the best tool for a student to use to measure out a precise amount of liquid.

H3.text: A graduated cylinder is the best tool for a student to use when they need to measure out a precise amount of liquid.

A4.text: Graduated cylinders are generally more accurate and precise than laboratory flasks and beakers

A5.text: A traditional graduated cylinder is usually narrow and tall so as to increase the accuracy and precision of volume measurement
